title: Trapped in This Boring Room! - Novel Updates
tags: Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Short Story   Time Loop   Time Travel
author: Rifujin na Magonote   Unreasonable Backscratcher   理不尽な孫の手
description:
When I woke up, I was in a pure white room.

There was only one machine in it, and that PC’s display had these words:

【You cannot leave this room unless you rank first on the novel posting site, “Let’s Write a Novel”】

And so began this story of me being trapped in this room with nothing in it, the story of my hellish daily life of posting novels.>
